item.title: Two killed, two injured as car rams stationary truck in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two killed, two injured as car rams stationary truck in Jogulamba Gadwal
A tragic collision on NH-44 near Kodandapur claimed the lives of Sravani and daughter Sai Charitra as their car rammed a stationary truck. Two others were critically injured. In Narayanpet, a sand-laden truck fatally ran over a biker.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 30 May 2025, 11:28 AM
Alampur: Tragedy struck a family when their car rammed into a stationary truck on National Highway 44 near Kodandapur village in Jo...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
